ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.model
Class VirtualRepository

java.lang.Object
  ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.model.VirtualRepository

public class VirtualRepository
extends java.lang.Object

A facade combining LocalRepository and a remote database into one interface.
